testcase.name: Validate Autopulation
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed And user validates that Institute, Division, Email Address, and Phone Number fields are not editable.passed When the User selects a principal Investigator by typing their name in the principal Investigator search box. "Sohil Zalmay".passed Then the Institute, Division, Email Address, and Phone Number fields are auto-populated. "NCI","OD","@nih.gov","2402766573".passed Then user validates that Institute, Division, Email Address, and Phone Number fields are not editable.passed And the user logs out.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Study Submission
testcase.system-out: Given a User has logged in to the NIH COVID-19 Biorepository Dashboard Application.passed And the user verifies that the submit button is disbaled by default.........passed When the User selects a Principal Investigator "Sohil Zalmay"...............passed And enters a unique IRB Protocol Number which can contain numbers and text such as "65YUT55".passed And enters a Study Title as "COVID Study"...................................passed And selects any Biospecimen Type "Other" and enters Other type as "tissue"..passed And selects any Biospecimen Collection Frequency............................passed And verifies that "NCI Frederick" text is displayed in the Repository Location text box.passed And enters Study Specific Aims "Prevent the development or recurrence of disease".passed And attaches an IRB Protocol Document.......................................passed And attaches a Related URL..................................................passed Then the User is able to successfully submit the study "65YUT55"............passed

testcase.name: Covid dash Login
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the COVID-19 Biorepository login page...............passed When the User clicks on Login to access button..............................passed And logs in by entering iTrust credentials..................................passed Then the User is directed to the home page..................................passed
